function ERI_EP04_13()
    --.承-4【11月第3週】「ウソと罪人」
    SaveData.Title = "ウソと罪人"

    --//BG：男子部教室（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015ca")

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav")

    --//BU：オウガ（通常）、先輩たち（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0281.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "Hermes Himegami is the 'true identity of the shadow coed faction'?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0676.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Yeah, no doubt about it. Erika apparently heard it straight from her mouth." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0075.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "That Daria-dono..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0048.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 "It's hard to believe at first glance, it is." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0054.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "............" ]])

--;吉★　テキスト修正「授業後、　」→「授業後、」（2020/02/01 16:07）
    MSG([[ After class in the boys' division that day, I decided to honestly tell everyone in the boys' division about Daria's betrayal. ]])

    MSG([[ I was unsure whether to tell them, but especially since many in the boys' division were closely connected to Daria, I thought I really should. ]])

    MSG([[ But seeing everyone's faces all cloud over at once, I felt a bit of regret. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0677.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 (Yeah, of course. Nobody wants to know that someone close to them has been lying forever...) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01pa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0282.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "Haa--- Hahaha! This is getting interesting!" ]])

    MSG([[ My worried thoughts were laughed off by Ouga. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0283.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "I, Ouga, will back up Lady Erika with all the power of the Rokujou family! It's my duty as your fiancé!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0678.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I-I don't think we're actually engaged though." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0076.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "Of course we'll cooperate too! We chose Yuriai Private Academy precisely because it's full of young ladies, so coeducation would totally ruin it!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0049.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 "If the boys' status improves too much, the girls will stop looking down on us! That would be awful!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0055.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "I think, therefore yuri exists... but I, I am unnecessary... Guys are better off as mere observers... Too many ruins it." ]])

    MSG([[ The upperclassmen also promised their cooperation for their own various reasons. ]])

    MSG([[ It seemed like we weren’t on the same wavelength at all, but somehow we were... right? ]])

    MSG([[ The enemy is the largest faction within the school. I want to increase even just one ally. Ouga and the seniors’ words are truly reassuring. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0679.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Thank you very much, everyone! I'm sure Erika will truly be happy from the bottom of her heart!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0284.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "Take good care of my fiancée, Minato." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0285.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 "Still, that Daria Himegami is the head of the coed faction. I'm impressed she managed to keep up the act right in front of us." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0077.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 "Even helping us at the Hakuyosai Festival... was probably only for coeducation." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0050.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 "I can't believe it! She was laughing so happily back then!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0056.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "Maybe she really did enjoy it." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0680.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Mask Senpai #3, what do you mean by that?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0057.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "I mean, it’s not necessary to fake every emotion... What matters is not letting others see what you truly feel inside." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0058.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 "We just conveniently interpreted Daria’s surface attitude... isn’t that a possibility?" ]])

    MSG([[ His words made my chest ache. Indeed, Daria never once said she wasn’t putting Marika in a corner. ]])

    MSG([[ I had trusted her on my own, considered her an ally on my own, and now I was the only one shouting betrayal on my own. ]])

    MSG([[ Besides, I myself am currently hiding the truth of being Minato Ikusa’s female persona, Erika Ikusa. If Daria’s betrayal is a sin, then I am a sinner as well. ]])

    MSG([[ I am the one who lies more than anyone and keeps betraying everyone's trust, after all. ]])

    MSG([[ Once again, I deeply realize the sinful nature of my actions that I have long avoided facing. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    --　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    --//BG：1-A教室（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    MSG([[ The next day — ]])

    MSG([[ Right after school, I held a strategy meeting for the Princess Election together with the "Knights". ]])

    --//BU：ヒユ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ With almost the entire class seated, Hiyu stood at the podium, raised her fist to the ceiling, and shouted loudly. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0308.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Alright! We’re all going to support Elder Sister Erika and Lady Hermes’ love road together~~~!" ]])

    --//SE：歓声
PLAY_SE("SEf002.wav")
--WAIT(500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1117.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (Why is such a misunderstanding spreading...?) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The false story I told Hiyu yesterday had unexpectedly taken on a life of its own. ]])

    MSG([[ This time’s Princess Election started because I secretly went on a date with Hermes without Daria knowing. ]])

    MSG([[ I had explained that, but a misunderstanding spread that it’s a serious love battle between me and Daria over Hermes. ]])

    MSG([[ Even Hiyu, whom I directly explained to, is completely convinced about the love triangle between me and the Himegami sisters, and won’t listen otherwise. ]])

    MSG([[ I felt the terrible effects of the game of telephone firsthand. ]])

    STOP_SE("SEf002.wav",1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01mb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0309.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Huff huff... The love between Elder Sister and Lady Hermes... just imagining it makes my nosebleed flood like a waterfall!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1118.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Uh, um, it’s not a love road or anything, so please stop the nosebleed there. That amount of blood loss is really concerning." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//BU：ヒユ（興奮鼻血）、モブ女子生徒Ｄ×２
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01mb")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("aeon_0023.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Heiwado Ine】
 "Oh my. What are you saying, Elder Sister? The rumors spread like the wind at lightning speed, you know?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("jusco_0020.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Heiwado Jasuko】
 "An idol caught between her sister and junior... such a scandalous topic surely makes one’s heart burn like fire." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01eb")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0310.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Elder Sister Erika, please don’t worry! We will absolutely make the romance with Lady Hermes succeed!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01cb")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0311.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Ah, like love cupids!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1119.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Sigh..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ It feels like crying like an infant. ]])

    MSG([[ But on second thought, this misunderstanding might work in our favor. ]])

    MSG([[ I don’t want to make everyone worry needlessly, and if I can avoid telling them about what happened with Daria, that’s fine. ]])

    MSG([[ The most important part — wagering something precious and fighting against Daria — is true, after all. ]])

    --//BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1120.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Thank you everyone for staying after school." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I took the podium in place of Hiyu and bowed to everyone. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1121.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "As you all know, the opponent in the upcoming Princess Election is the top senior, Daria Himegami. She is the toughest opponent yet." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1122.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "But I have a reason I cannot lose. In this next Princess Election, I absolutely cannot lose." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1123.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "So please, lend me your strength once more." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0015")
    MSG([[
    【Knights】
 "Yes, Elder Sister Erika!" ]])

    MSG([[ The knights responded cheerfully to my words. Their bright response made me feel a twinge of guilt. ]])

    MSG([[ Both the boys' division and the knights truly trust and support me and Erika from the bottom of their hearts. ]])

    MSG([[ I doubt they have any idea that I’m really a boy and am confronting Daria to save my sister. ]])

    MSG([[ In terms of keeping lies from dear friends, I am no different from Daria. ]])
    --//BU：ヒユ（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ga")
	SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0312.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "The reason Elder Sister Erika can’t lose is surely..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ma")
	SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0313.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "In the next Princess Election, did Elder Sister and Daria bet the right to be engaged to Lady Hermes?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01gb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

LAYER_EFFECT(50,6,30,30,500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0314.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Hyyyaaaaaaaahhhhh!!!! It’s lit up in here!!!!" ]])

    --//BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)


    MSG([[ While the classroom became lively as usual, I silently made a certain resolution. ]])

STOP_BGM(1500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1124.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (If I can save my sister, I will properly reveal the truth to everyone.) ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1125.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (I will properly atone for the sins of all the deception until now.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERI_EP04_14")
end
